Title: The Lesson of the Iron Bough
Description: First, you will need weapons suited to your talents. Retrieve a spellblade and a hand fan from one of the weapon racks below, bring it to me, and show me that you know how to hold it properly.
ObjectivesText: Retrieve and equip a Trainee's Spellblade and a Trainee's Hand Fan.
CompletionText: Picking up your first weapon is also a symbolic gesture. Every $c that leaves these training grounds must be ready to take up arms in defense of their fellow pandaren.
RewardText:
A fine weapon. It should suit your needs well.

Now let's put it to use.

Objectives.Text: Loot and Equip a Trainee's Spellblade
Loot and Equip a Trainee's Hand Fan
